text: this footage shows the moment Istanbul
atat√ºrk Airport was hit by a coordinated
and deadly attack three suicide bombers
stormed the busy international terminal
1 reportedly opening fire with a
Kalashnikov machine gun and detonating a
device after being shot by police the
Turkish Prime Minister has now blamed
this so-called Islamic state group for
the assault
eyewitnesses who were in the terminal
described how the situation unfolded
people were shooting on one side and we
all ran the other way
and then bombs went off police their own
no retaliation they were shooting at the
police and the police was shooting at
them someone next to us got shot then we
saw the bomb in the x-ray machine
explode everybody around it died in that
blast
this is one of the busiest airports in
Europe more than 61 million passengers
passed through here last year the volume
of passengers making it a vulnerable
target and many now say the authorities
were unprepared for an assault of this
scale Turkey has been hit by a wave of
recent attacks just this year several
have been blamed on either Kurdish
separatists or the so-called Islamic
state group the country's president red
ship type Iran has been heavily
criticized for not doing enough to
tackle the threats his country faces but
after the events here many are left
wondering what he can do to improve the
security situation in Turkey a country
which sits strategically in what is
becoming an ever volatile region
